main event: In February 1957, a civilian witnessed a UFO sighting in Omaha, Nebraska. The object, described as round, the size of a pen head, white, and blinking, was observed low on the horizon for 3 minutes before disappearing to the north.
interesting points: The duration of the observation was 3 minutes, providing a substantial period for the witness to study the object.
The UFO was described as a round, white object the size of a pen head, with blinking lights, indicating a detailed observation.
The disappearance of the object was noted as fading away, adding to the mysterious nature of the sighting.
The report suggests a probable aircraft sighting, indicating the possibility of misidentification.
The document is related to Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program to investigate unidentified flying objects (UFOs), lending credibility to the report.
